snippet: The Philadelphia Art Commission is expected to vote on Wednesday on plans to erect a 40-foot-high stainless steel sculpture by Ellsworth Kelly at the end of a reflecting pool in the garden of the new Barnes Foundation, which will open in May in...
abstract: The Philadelphia Art Commission is expected to vote on Wednesday on plans to erect a 40-foot-high stainless steel sculpture by Ellsworth Kelly at the end of a reflecting pool in the garden of the new Barnes Foundation, which will open in May in downtown Philadelphia.

headline.main: Vote Planned on 40-Foot Outdoor Sculpture at Philadelphia's New Barnes Foundation
